original_text: and took six hundred chosen chariots and all the other chariots of Egypt with officers over all of them.
korean_text: 선발된 병거 육백 대와 애굽의 모든 병거를 동원하니 지휘관들이 다 거느렸더라

sentences.original_text: and took six hundred chosen chariots
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 선택된 병거 육백 대를 데리고

sentences.original_text: and all the other chariots of Egypt
with officers over all of them
